column3: Latest;Kampot Province: A crackdown on illegal drug trafficking at Chum Meal Village
column6: Kampot Province led to two arrests.------A 31 year old and 27 year old male Cambodian were detained along with five large packages  and thirteen small packages of methamphetamine
column7: weighing 529.39 grams.------The suspects are being prepared to face the court. AREY NEWS
